Key Match Events: Mahmoud Al Aswad scored in the 7th minute to put Syria in the lead
Daleho Irandust scored in the 76th minute to double the lead for Syria
Sabbag scored late in stoppage time to seal the win for Syria
Pre-Game Insights: India had to win the contest while Syria just needed a draw to secure the trophy
Post-Match Reflections: Manolo Marquez' first assignment as coach ended on a sour note for India
India produced a better performance in the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian defence had a rough day at the office
Gurpreet Singh made an all-important save in the 35th minute to deny Syria a second goal
Sahal was India's best player so far in the match
Others: Syria won the Intercontinental Cup 2024 with a 3-0 win over India
The match was played at the Gachibowli Stadium in Hyderabad on September 9, 2024
